duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and implement the day-to-day operations of the Family Support Services and Teen Program, including outreach and in-home visits, academic tutoring, and coordination with local resources.
Supervise additional staff and volunteers, lead meetings, and ensure administrative tasks are performed, such as filing paperwork and attending check-ins with supervisor.

Conduct community outreach, assess needs, communicate with teachers and counselors, plan afterschool (and summer) sessions, provide academic tutoring, and prepare teens for permit test and driver’s education.

education_certification.credential: College degree, language proficiency, classroom teaching experience, and familiarity with computer and cellphone technology.
